summary: A lonely guy, living an uneventful life in Paris, takes care of his mother. One day, a girl with a more exciting life moves in his apartment building.
cast: Michaël Abiteboul|Lola Dueñas|Carmen Machi|Lucienne Deschamps|Victoria Sáez|Saeed Khan|Jacky Nercessian|Jean Fornerod|Alain Rimoux|Eric Peuvrel|Ana Bara|Laurent Bariteau
title: Lo que sé de Lola
